name: Chievo's Return-(WIP)
description:
Chievo's Return -- A horror puzzle game

You were trying to make a Youtube video about going into this abandoned and restricted place, when suddenly you've locked yourself in it. You need to find a way out before "Chievo" finds you..

Controls:

W = Move forward     A = Move left     S = Move backwards     D = Move right

Mouse = look

E = Interact

This game is made by a 12 year old, so please don't judge..

==========================NOTE============================

THIS GAME IS STILL IN PROGRESS!! EXPECT SOME GLITCHES AND SOME WEIRD STUFF!! AVOID PLAYING AT HIGH GRAPHICS BECAUSE IT IS NOT DONE YET!!

===========================================================

Chievo's Return V0.6

Thanks for playing my game! Consider donating to help me improve the game!!
